mapper.select: SELECT o.order_id, o.cust_id, o.order_date, o.order_amount, o.user_point, o.pay_amount, d.orderdetail_id, d.item_id, d.order_cnt, i.item_img, i.item_name FROM item_order o JOIN orderdetail d ON o.order_id = d.order_id JOIN item i ON d.item_id = i.item_id WHERE o.order_id = #{order_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO item_order (order_id, cust_id, order_date, order_amount, user_point, pay_amount,order_name, order_phone, od_addr1, od_addr2) VALUES (item_order_seq.NEXTVAL, #{cust_id}, SYSDATE, #{order_amount}, #{minus_point}, #{pay_amount}, #{order_name}, #{order_phone}, #{od_addr1}, #{od_addr2})
